mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reserve WHERE memberId=#{memberId}

SELECT c.reserveNo as reserveNo, c.seat as seat, c.scheduleNo as scheduleNo, c.adultNum as adultNum, c.teenNum as teenNum, c.status as status, to_char(c.scheduleDate, 'yyyymmdd') as scheduleDate, c.scheduleTime as scheduleTime, c.movieNo as movieNo, c.movieTitle as movieTitle FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, r.*, s.scheduleNo as originscheduleNo, s.scheduleDate, s.scheduleTime, s.screen, s.movieNo, m.movieTitle FROM reserve r, schedule s, movie m WHERE memberId=#{memberId} and r.scheduleNo = s.scheduleNo and s.movieNo = m.movieNo AND rownum <= 1 * 10 ORDER BY status ) c WHERE c.rn > (1 - 1) * 10
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve SET status = 1 WHERE reserveNo IN ( SELECT r.reserveNo FROM reserve r, schedule s WHERE r.scheduleNo = s.scheduleNo AND to_char(scheduleDate, 'yyyyMMdd') <= #{scheduleDate} AND scheduleTime < #{time} and status = 0 )
